function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sustainable architectural and urban design","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation in built environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable architectural and urban design practices","Technologies":"Green building materials, energy-efficient design, urban planning tools","People":"Low-and middle-income families","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Inadequate housing environment","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Development of affordable and healthy housing solutions","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purification technologies, building insulation","People":"Low-and middle-income families","Owner":"Housing developers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Economic gap and housing costs","Impact":"Strain on mental health and health/welfare of low-and middle-income families","Mitigation":"Balancing housing costs with adequate housing environment and welfare support","Technologies":"Affordable construction materials, financial support mechanisms, sustainable development practices","People":"Low-and middle-income families","Owner":"Policy makers, housing developers, financial institutions"}]}
